segments.text: Mmmm ... This apartment seems a little expensive . Do you have any cheap studios ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , the one-bedroom is the only vacant apartment right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think any studios will open up soon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not for a few months .
segments.speaker: S2
